sentences.english: Euphemism is a social linguistic phenomenon, which is able to reflect the contained cultural implications.
sentences.chinese: 委婉语是人类语言使用过埕中的一种普遍现象。

sentences.english: There are two types of fluid inclusions: petroleum inclusions and aqueous inclusions in the reservoir sandstones.
sentences.chinese: 埕岛东斜坡带砂岩储层发育石油包裹体与盐水包裹体。

sentences.english: Some mechanical recovery wells in Chengdao Oilfiled produce oil in tubing -casing annular space.
sentences.chinese: 胜利埕岛油田部分机械采油井存在油套环空出油现象。

sentences.english: The application of this method in interference well testing in Chengbei oilfield is also presented.
sentences.chinese: 并介绍了此方法在埕北油田干扰试井中的应用效果。

sentences.english: Fireworks illuminate the skies of Taipei during the evening of the ROC National Day on Oct. 10.
sentences.chinese: 烟火于十月十日的国庆日照亮台北大稻埕的夜空。

sentences.english: Chengdao oilfield is the first developed epicontinental sea monoblock oilfield.
sentences.chinese: 埕岛油田是我国投入开发的第一个浅海整装大油田。

sentences.english: There are many scale-different sand-gravel body that developed in downdropped block of Chengnan great fault.
sentences.chinese: 埕南大断层下降盘发育了许多不同规模的砂砾岩体。
